title: 107_hr3785
content: Math and Science Teacher Recruitment Act of 2002 - Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to establish new programs of student guaranteed and direct loan forgiveness for mathematics and science teachers in low-income, public middle and secondary schools. Requires for eligibility: (1) at least three consecutive complete school years of such teaching. (2) an undergraduate or graduate degree in mathematics, life or physical sciences, technology, or engineering, and (3) State certification or license.
